info.name: Flag Command
info.description: Embark on the "Dimensional Escape Quest" where you wake up in a mysterious forest maze that"s not quite of this world. Navigate singing squirrels, mischievous nymphs, and grumpy wizards in a whimsical labyrinth that may lead to otherworldly surprises. Will you conquer the enchanted maze or find yourself lost in a different dimension of magical challenges? The journey unfolds in this mystical escape!
